channel.title: SolPi - Cardano Stake Pool on [SolPi]
channel.description: Recent content in SolPi - Cardano Stake Pool on [SolPi]

item.title: Mission
item.description: We are supporting true decentralization to the cardano blockchain by running our pool on bare metal on-permises. Our pool is fed by 100% solar power and runs on low power consuming Raspberry Pi’s. We donate 10% of our profits to seaspiracy.org to support our oceans and stop destroying our beautiful planet. Another 10% of our profits we donate to c-innovations.de to spread their products and their innovative technology stack on carbon-neutral and carbon-reducing devices to make this planet a better place.
